name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience developing high-performance applications across healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Java**, **Go**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Angular**, with hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend development utilizing **React**, **Node.js**, and **npm**. Skilled in **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration, ensuring streamlined deployment and scalability. Experienced in building compliance-driven solutions aligned with HIPAA and PCI DSS standards.
Demonstrated ability in software design, planning, and concept creation, with a strong focus on delivering robust architectural solutions. Proven track record in performance testing using **JMeter** and managing databases with **Oracle**, **SQL**, and **PL/SQL**. Adept at integrating **JBoss** and **Wildfly** for application hosting, while applying effective networking strategies for optimized system performance.
